main.title: Choose Your Path
main.text: You discover the chronicles of Michael Borck, a versatile technologist with 11 career chapters. Which aspect of their journey interests you most?

professional.title: Professional Focus
professional.text: Michael Borck has built an impressive career spanning military service, academia, and industry. Which era would you like to explore?

personal.title: Personal Journey
personal.text: Beyond the professional achievements, discover the person behind the CV. Michael Borck has diverse interests and creative projects.

work.title: Career Timeline
work.text: Three distinct phases define this journey: Military Service (1989-2000), Academia (2001-Present), and Consulting (2008-Present). Where shall we begin?

work.title: Industry & Consulting
work.text: Beyond military and academia, Michael Borck has extensive consulting experience across multiple industries.

education.title: Education Complete
education.text: A strong foundation in Computer Science, Mathematics, and Business. Continue your exploration?

military.title: IT Manager
military.text: Submarine Systems Centre, RAN (Jul 1996 – Jan 2000): Strategic IT Leadership - Managed comprehensive information technology infrastructure supporting submarine operations and maintenance Executive Advisory - Provided strategic IT guidance to senior military leadership and operational boards

military.title: Project Manager — Command and Control
military.text: HQADF (Jul 1993 – Dec 1996): Strategic Leadership - Managed development of critical military messaging systems for Australian Defence Force headquarters Project Excellence - Successfully controlled cost, schedule, and quality across multi-year defense communications project

military.title: Military Journey Complete
military.text: You have explored the military service era. Where to next?

academic.title: Lecturer — School of Marketing and Management
academic.text: Curtin University: AI Program Leadership - AI Leader for the School, developing new AI programs within undergraduate and postgraduate curricula

academic.title: Course Leadership & Development
academic.text: Curtin University: Course Lead for Information Systems undergraduate and postgraduate degree programs

academic.title: Academic Path Complete
academic.text: Michael Borck has achieved 100% student satisfaction and pioneered AI education. Continue exploring?

industry.title: AI, IS & Educational Technology Consultant
industry.text: Self-Employed: AI strategy and implementation consultation

industry.title: Software Contractor
industry.text: CRCSI & Landgate WA: Computer Vision Innovation - Developed automated detection and recognition systems for street sign inventory

industry.title: Consulting Journey Complete
industry.text: You have explored the consulting and industry experience. Ready for more?

projects.title: Reality Reigns
projects.text: Swipe-based decision game providing interactive fiction storytelling from fantasy adventures to educational simulations

projects.title: Talk Buddy
projects.text: AI-based audio interface tool for conversation practice (medical diagnoses, HR discussions, English conversation)

projects.title: Curriculum Curator
projects.text: AI-based tool for creating, managing and curating learning materials based on unique teaching philosophies

projects.title: Feed Forward System
projects.text: AI-based assessment feedback tool for various assessment types

projects.title: Projects Explored
projects.text: You have discovered innovative AI tools and educational platforms. What next?

skills.title: Master Python
skills.text: You discover expertise in Python. This is a valuable skill in modern development.

skills.text: You discover expertise in C/C++. This is a valuable skill in modern development.

skills.text: You discover expertise in C#. This is a valuable skill in modern development.

skills.text: You discover expertise in Java. This is a valuable skill in modern development.

skills.title: Master JavaScript
skills.text: You discover expertise in JavaScript. This is a valuable skill in modern development.

skills.title: Skills Mastered
skills.text: You have discovered a diverse technical skillset. Ready to complete your journey?

achievements.title: 100% Student Satisfaction
achievements.text: Achieved perfect satisfaction scores across multiple units including ISYS3015, ISYS2001, and ISYS6018.

achievements.title: AI Leader & Innovator
achievements.text: AI Leader for School of Marketing and Management, creator of multiple AI-powered educational tools.

achievements.title: Published Author
achievements.text: 4 technical books (Creative Commons licensed) and 6+ peer-reviewed publications in computer vision and machine learning.

achievements.title: Path Complete!
achievements.text: You've explored one path through Michael Borck's journey. There are many more stories to discover! Try different choices to uncover all experiences.
achievements.leftResult: showNotificationFn("Thank you for playing! Contact: michael.borck@curtin.edu.au")

deploymentChallenge.title: DEPLOYMENT CHALLENGE
deploymentChallenge.description: A critical deployment is failing in production. How do you handle it?
